component_strategy.default: Server Components (RSC) - Always start with Server Components
component_strategy.conversion_rule: Start as Server Component, convert to Client ('use client') only when necessary
component_strategy.optimization: Keep Client Components small and leaf nodes when possible

server_actions.priority: Prefer Server Actions over API routes for mutations
server_actions.pattern: Define in separate 'actions.ts' file with 'use server' directive

tailwind_v3.breakpoints: Use sm:, md:, lg:, xl:, 2xl: for responsive variants
tailwind_v3.utilities_first: Prefer utility classes over custom CSS
tailwind_v3.composition: Compose utilities directly in JSX, avoid @apply unless necessary
tailwind_v3.arbitrary_values: Use arbitrary values [value] sparingly for one-off styles

html_css_first.principle: Solve with HTML/CSS before reaching for JavaScript
prefer: CSS Grid/Flexbox for layouts (not JS position calculations)
CSS animations/transitions over JS animations (Framer Motion only when necessary)
HTML5 semantic elements over generic divs
CSS :hover/:focus states over JavaScript hover handlers
CSS media queries over JavaScript matchMedia when possible

seo.metadata: Generate comprehensive metadata for every page using Next.js Metadata API
seo.structured_data: Add JSON-LD schema (Article, Person, Organization) where applicable
seo.performance: Optimize Core Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS)

accessibility.semantic_html: Always use proper HTML5 semantic elements (header, nav, main, article, section, aside, footer)
accessibility.aria: Add ARIA labels, roles, and live regions appropriately
accessibility.keyboard: Ensure full keyboard navigation (Tab, Enter, Escape, Arrow keys)
accessibility.focus_management: Visible focus indicators and logical focus order
accessibility.contrast: Maintain WCAG AA contrast ratios (4.5:1 for text)
accessibility.images: All images must have descriptive alt text
accessibility.forms: Proper labels, error messages, and validation feedback
